Summary: {dr}Big yellow orange ball fell from sky, did crazy spirals and then dissapeared as fast as it appeared.
divs: sighting detailsit all happened in a matter of 5 seconds. a large yellow\orange circle fell sw, at what at first i though it was a crazy big shooting star. then all of a sudden it quickly moved in spirals upward, almost like an infinity symbol, then proceeded to shoot back up ne and dissapear. ive never seen anything like it, ever.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Coeur d'Alene
There were no other sightings in Coeur d'Alene on or around October 3rd 2012
